name: Warmth (itch) (sessena)
description:
A deadly winter has frozen the lands and you are the world's last hope!

As a spirit speaker you can hear the voices of the warriors who died before you, they will guide your way, but beware! You will die of exposure if you don't collect enough oil for your lamp. 

Warmth is a pixel platformer for Windows with a timer component that was created during my first semester studying Game Creation.

Controls Install Instructions
  1. Download the File
  2. Unzip
  3. Run the Application
  4. Have fun!
